WELCOME_MESSAGE: Welcome to the ANY.RUN Sandbox API for Telegram! Please enter a command or a message.
HELP_MESSAGE:
Here are the available commands:

/start - Start the bot
/help - Show this help message

You can also interact with the bot by sending messages directly to it.
LANGUAGE_INFO: If you change your language in Telegram, use /language command to update the bot's language.
LANGUAGE_UPDATE_ERROR: An error occurred while updating the language. Please try again later.
